name: Urban Area
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population

[+2 Gold] <within [1] tiles of a [Citadel]> <after adopting [Coalition Complete]>
[+2 Gold] <within [1] tiles of a [Residential]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
[+2 Culture] <within [1] tiles of a [Concert Avenue]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
[+2 Culture] <within [1] tiles of a [Landmark]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
[+4 Culture] <within [1] tiles of a [Academy]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
[+4 Production] <within [1] tiles of a [Manufactory]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
[+4 Gold] <within [1] tiles of a [Customs House]> <after adopting [Safety Checks]>
